head.title: Swap pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files with {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to modify the page order in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily manage PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and more.

header.title: Swap {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} adds advanced document editing features to {{EnvNameShort}} applications. Effortlessly reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} files to improve structure and readability.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} capabilities
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Use it to merge, split, extract, rearrange, swap, and delete pages across different document types.

more_features.title: Powerful document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a comprehensive set of tools to modify and organize documents in over 50 formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple document types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, images, and archive files. Customize the output to match your needs.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document layout
feature_2.content: Modify the structure of your documents by moving, swapping, or deleting pages to enhance organization.

feature_3.title: Change page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape mode as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract individual pages or page ranges to create new documents.

formats.title: Modify page order in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, allowing you to fine-tune document layouts effortlessly.

operations.title: Core features
operations.description: Explore the main functionalities of our document processing library.

examples.comment_2: Define the pages to be swapped
examples.comment_4: Save the updated file to a new location

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to rearrange pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents, giving you full control over document organization. Integrate efficient document editing into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Specify the file path for the {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Select the pages to be swapped or reordered.
content.step_3: Apply the appropriate method to modify the document.
content.step_4: Save the updated document to the desired location.

code_1.title: Swap the first and last pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: This example shows how to swap pages in a {{FileFormatUp}} file in just a few steps.
